subject: A SPECIAL MESSAGE FROM THE OTHER SIDE FOR ALL OF US
author: bhali333
full_text:
HI EVERYBODY,

I HAVE RECIEVED A MESSAGE FROM MY TECHNITIONS ON THE OTHER SIDE 
THROUGH FRANK'S BOX #12.

THE SIGNAL WAS NOT THE BEST BUT THEY TRIED REAL HARD TO GET THE 
MESSAGE ACROSS. IT IS A LONG MESSAGE BY THE LENGTH THAT WE ARE USED 
TO SO i HAVE BROKEN IT DOWN INTO 4 PARTS.

I HAVE BEEN RECIEVING ALOT OF MESSAGES LATELY THAT ARE SPEAKING OF 
MARMONICS AND TOGETHERNESS OF INDIVIDUALS INVOLVED IN EVP 
COMMUNICATION ESPESCIALLY THE ONE THAT USE REAL TIME BOX 
COMMUNICATION.

THE MESSAGES AS FAR AS I UNDERSTAND ARE TELLING US TO BE IN MENTAL 
AND EMOTIONAL SYNC WITH ONE ANOTHER, AND A POSITIVE FRAME OF MIND AND 
POSITIVE VIBRATION IS THE KEY TO SUCCESFULL FURTHERENCE OF THE 
COMMUNICATION PROCESS. IT LENDS MORE STRENGTH TO OUR FRIENDS ON THE 
OTHER SIDE TO ENABLE THEM TO DELIVER THEIR MESSAGES MORE CLEARLY.

TODAY i HAVE RECIEVED IN ONE LONG MESSAGE THE CONFORMATION OF THESE 
SHORT MESSAGES THAT I HAVE BEEN GETTING OVER THE PAST TWO WEEKS.
THE FOUR SEGMENTS WILL BE POSTED FOLLOWING THIS POST AND PUT IN A 
FILE FOLDER DESIGNATED "IMPORTANT MESSAGE" IN THE FILE AREA

THE FILES ARE AS FOLLOWS IN SEQUENCE A TO D

"A_
BRUCE TO BREAK THROUGH_THE PEOPLE_TELL THEM TO FORM A CIRCLE_THIS 
CIRCLE IS LIKE AN INTERCOM"

"B_PLEASE COME TOGETHER"

"C_THEIR THE FILTER"

"D_WON'T YOU PLEASE COME TOGETHER"

i HAVE BEEN DOING RESEARCH WITH BOX #12 FOR A WHILE NOW ON A DAILY 
BASIS AND HAVE DEVELOPED A KEEN EAR FOR LISTENING TO THIS PARTICULAR 
BOX AS WELL AS OTHERS, THESE FILES MAY TAKE SOME OF YOU A COUPLE OF 
LISTENS TO HEAR BUT THE MESSAGE CAME THROUGH VERY CLEAR.

BRUCE
